title: Ask A Bronzie
body: Leave me any questions and I will answer them to the extent that I can! ^_^

Why do so many Bronze players believe they belong in a higher elo?
because they think they are better than they really are and its only team mates that are holding them back from climbing

> [{quoted}](name=Hunted Horror,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=x6zvdPpn,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-05-12T22:32:28.950+0000)
>
> Why do so many Bronze players believe they belong in a higher elo?

I do. AFKs are extremely common place in Bronze. I'm not saying I'm Gold, but I would be at least Bronze 3 easy, on my way to Silver instead of struggling in Bronze 5 if not for AFKs. Punishment is not the way to solve this issue of AFKs in this game.
Well in ranked, I only see an AFK once every 10 games
Why do bronze players refuse to believe the clear statistics that prove people who ward more win more games?
it's not that they refuse to believe that, it is that they just rely on the support to ward everything and they do not see the overall point of warding when they stay in lanes 80% of the time
Follow-up question: why do bronze supports refuse to believe the statistics that prove buying a Sightstone and warding wins more games?
Well, bronze players focus more on kills and getting fed rathar than objective control
“ they do not see the overall point of warding when they stay in lanes 80% of the time”
why do bronze people insist on playing champs that the dont know how to play or is outside their skill range?
because they saw someone else play it really well, usually in a previous game, or a stream or video they saw.

Looks like you're being honest to yourself, since silver 5 is pretty much still bronze skill-wise.

Anyways, questions time!

What happened to your past uh.... 10-ish games? OP.GG is telling me the weirdest stuff.
How long have you been playing League?
Since you are going to admit that you're not the best player in the world, what do you believe you should improve on? Or do you plan to climb anywhere higher anytime soon?
Are you awesome?

-The past 10-ish games I just intentionally fed in those games cause It's fun to see people freak out (got a 2-week ban btw)
-I have been playing league since mid-season 4
-I could really improve on map awareness, warding, and freezing my lane (I overextend way too often)
-If I really get down I could get to gold by the end of the season to get that victorious skin.
how many cats can you fit in your fanny pack on sunday morning during a leap year while juggling monkeys on unicycles?
I can't juggle or ride a unicycle; sooooo none.
Why are you bronze?
I don't play Ranked often but when I do I get tilted too easily and make bad plays a lot.
Youve earned my respect

In your opinion, what is the best way to play yasuo?

- What to max first?
- What match ups are good/bad?
- Does Katarina require skill?
- Is it worth building arm pen on him?
- Runes? Masteries? and why?


EDIT: UPVOTE THIS THREAD PLS, THE WORLD NEEDS TO SEE.

I'm a {{champion:157}} main so this should be easy!

-I max e first (I knew you wanted me to say q)
-Good matchups are people that are skillshots orientated like ahri, xerath, velkoz etc. Bad ones are people that really bursty that have 1 or no skillshots like fizz, talon
-Katarina actually takes a lot of skill cause you only need to be stun once in a teamfight to get instakilled so you have to go in at just the right time when all their cc is down
-Armour pen is good on pretty much anyone thats ad and does tons of damage. It is really useful for tanks and just doing the extra bit of damage to kill someone
-For runes: Attack damage reds, Armour yellows, Mr scaling blues, and Crit damage quints. I take the quints since his passive lowers his crit dmg the runes bring it back up to a normal champion, and the others are for a bit more ad and defences. and for masteries I tale 18-12-0 with Warlord's because it has saved my life so many times!

Haha yeah I was wondering if you would say garbage like ''Maxing W is key to success'' or something like that. 

Just random questions really. But I don't agree with the arm pen answer you gave me simply because yasuo's ulti gives you 50% arm pen passively after the ult is landed. And his sheer damage is usually enough to go through most tanks.

But the runes are pretty much exactly the same as mine, though I barely ever play him, I always keep a rune page for him because he is so damn fun to jump on everyone in a while.
